Imagine a Library Made By The Worldwide Community

Just like a "Youtube" for written files

"None of us is as smart as all of us."

- Kenneth Blanchard

It has been proven that one of the best ways to understand a topic is to learn about it from your peers. Teachers are great as primary sources of knowledge but your classmate's also have lots of useful info.

Students already take notes, so why not share them? Your notes could be the missing ingredient in your classmate's understanding.

This is where PeerNote comes into the picture!

We are a platform where students all over the world can share and leave their knowledge to be appreciated by the future generations

How it works:

- Sign In to Create a Course or a Topic Thread.

- On "Thread's Page" link your resource.

- Then share your "Resource Link" with our Community!
